item.title: Script to Generate Kernel Panic
item.description: This is a good tool to use to test what event cascade when a server crashes. WARNING: USE AT YOUR OWN RISK echo c > /proc/sysrq-trigger WARNING: USE AT YOUR OWN RISK Source: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/66197/how-to-cause-kernel-panic-with-a-single-command
